channel.title: CVE Feed for CA Technologies -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CA Technologies -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-9028|2024-08-05T07:10:47.363Z -- ca%20technologies -- ca%20privileged%20access%20manager
item.description: Weak cryptography used for passwords in CA Privileged Access Manager 2.x reduces the complexity for password cracking.

item.title: CVE-2018-6590|2024-08-05T06:10:10.656Z -- ca%20technologies -- ca%20api%20developer%20portal
item.description: CA API Developer Portal 4.x, prior to v4.2.5.3 and v4.2.7.1, has an unspecified reflected cross-site scripting vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2018-9024|2024-08-05T07:10:47.362Z -- ca%20technologies -- ca%20privileged%20access%20manager
item.description: An improper authentication vulnerability in CA Privileged Access Manager 2.x allows attackers to spoof IP addresses in a log file.

item.title: CVE-2018-6588|2024-08-05T06:10:10.687Z -- ca%20technologies -- ca%20api%20developer%20portal
item.description: CA API Developer Portal 3.5 up to and including 3.5 CR5 has a reflected cross-site scripting vulnerability related to the apiExplorer.

item.title: CVE-2018-8953|2024-08-05T07:10:47.354Z -- ca%20technologies -- workload%20automation%20ae
item.description: CA Workload Automation AE before r11.3.6 SP7 allows remote attackers to a perform SQL injection via a crafted HTTP request.

item.title: CVE-2018-9022|2024-08-05T07:10:47.348Z -- ca%20technologies -- ca%20privileged%20access%20manager
item.description: An authentication bypass vulnerability in CA Privileged Access Manager 2.8.2 and earlier allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or commands by poisoning a configuration file.

item.title: CVE-2018-6586|2024-08-05T06:10:10.629Z -- ca%20technologies -- ca%20api%20developer%20portal
item.description: CA API Developer Portal 3.5 up to and including 3.5 CR6 has a stored cross-site scripting vulnerability related to profile picture processing.

item.title: CVE-2018-6587|2024-08-05T06:10:10.355Z -- ca%20technologies -- ca%20api%20developer%20portal
item.description: CA API Developer Portal 3.5 up to and including 3.5 CR6 has a reflected cross-site scripting vulnerability related to the widgetID variable.

item.title: CVE-2018-9026|2024-08-05T07:10:47.406Z -- ca%20technologies -- ca%20privileged%20access%20manager
item.description: A session fixation vulnerability in CA Privileged Access Manager 2.x allows remote attackers to hijack user sessions with a specially crafted request.

item.title: CVE-2018-9029|2024-08-05T07:10:47.404Z -- ca%20technologies -- ca%20privileged%20access%20manager
item.description: An improper input validation vulnerability in CA Privileged Access Manager 2.x allows remote attackers to conduct SQL injection attacks.

item.title: CVE-2018-9021|2024-08-05T07:10:47.290Z -- ca%20technologies -- ca%20privileged%20access%20manager
item.description: An authentication bypass vulnerability in CA Privileged Access Manager 2.8.2 and earlier allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands with specially crafted requests.

item.title: CVE-2018-9023|2024-08-05T07:10:47.372Z -- ca%20technologies -- ca%20privileged%20access%20manager
item.description: An input validation vulnerability in CA Privileged Access Manager 2.x allows unprivileged users to execute arbitrary commands by passing specially crafted arguments to the update_crld script.

item.title: CVE-2018-9027|2024-08-05T07:10:47.359Z -- ca%20technologies -- ca%20privileged%20access%20manager
item.description: A reflected cross-site scripting vulnerability in CA Privileged Access Manager 2.x allows remote attackers to execute malicious script with a specially crafted link.

item.title: CVE-2018-8954|2024-08-05T07:10:47.264Z -- ca%20technologies -- workload%20control%20center
item.description: CA Workload Control Center before r11.4 SP6 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted HTTP request.

item.title: CVE-2018-6589|2024-08-05T06:10:10.419Z -- ca%20technologies -- ca%20spectrum
item.description: CA Spectrum 10.1 prior to 10.01.02.PTF_10.1.239 and 10.2.x prior to 10.2.3 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2018-9025|2024-08-05T07:10:47.353Z -- ca%20technologies -- ca%20privileged%20access%20manager
item.description: An input validation vulnerability in CA Privileged Access Manager 2.x allows remote attackers to poison log files with specially crafted input.
